text: The 17th Huading Awards ceremony was held on August 9, 2015 at Shanghai. ==Nominations and winners== Complete list of nominees and winners (denoted in bold)http://ent.sina.com.cn/v/2015-07-22/doc-ifxfaswi4201802.shtml {| class=wikitable style="width="100%" |- !
